articles.title: "Sad Day For America": Trump Slams US Election Conspiracy Charges - NDTV
articles.description: Donald Trump on Thursday slammed election conspiracy charges brought against him in a Washington court, saying he was a victim of "persecution of a political opponent" after he pleaded not guilty.
articles.content:
Donald Trump on Thursday pleaded not guilty to charges he tried to overturn US election in 2020.
